law.catch_line: A person may not knowingly possess, with unlawful intent, a counterfeit title to a motor vehicle....

text.section: A person may not knowingly possess, with unlawful intent, a counterfeit title to a motor vehicle.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 3 years or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
